channel.title: [Help needed] Client and server questions [Help needed]
channel.description:
Hey there! :) I have som questions about clients and editing them:
- In what document do i change the background and those things? i cant find where to change the file name.
- If i don't want the default crowns, how do i delete em? and how do i put in my own ones?
- Do i 100% have to use .jag files as sprites? (i got both of evry single file anyways:D)
Questions bout server:
- Where do i find theese welcome message interfaces? so i could edit them (im on a mac atm, thats why i can't find out by searching the text thats already in it)
- How do i make commands like ::unmute ::unipban ::unban and those ones? (want shortcut instead of going to character files and removing it, with all the compile stuffs and that)
- How do i make a yell message so that evry1 can see it?
- [IMPORTANT] if i have done ALOT changes on the server and client, would it take long to compile? :D
- Does it matther where i put in the codes in the client.java? or is it good as long as its just in there?
As u see, theres quite many questions, but im complete new and i think i've done kinda great from till now xD
- MrPurple
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Working on: Purple Pk project

item.title: [Help needed] Client and server questions [Help needed]
item.dc:creator: @MrPurple MrPurple
item.description:
@MrPurple wrote:

Oh, thx
Well, i don’t seem to find how to make the yell command?
Could you possibly help me there?
Where was the tut about the crowns?
cba means?

-MrPurple

Read full topic

item.title: [Help needed] Client and server questions [Help needed]
item.dc:creator: @klorox klorox
item.description:
@klorox wrote:

- In what document do i change the background and those things? i cant find where to change the file name.
Class30 Sub2_1_1
If i don't want the default crowns, how do i delete em? and how do i put in my own ones?
Follow a tut i cba to tell you how to do it. The rest is kinda common sense, follow tutorials and use the search button.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help needed] Client and server questions [Help needed]
item.dc:creator: @MrPurple MrPurple
item.description:
@MrPurple wrote:

Hey there!
I have som questions about clients and editing them:

  • In what document do i change the background and those things? i cant find where to change the file name.

  • If i don’t want the default crowns, how do i delete em? and how do i put in my own ones?

  • Do i 100% have to use .jag files as sprites? (i got both of evry single file anyways:D)

Questions bout server:

  • Where do i find theese welcome message interfaces? so i could edit them (im on a mac atm, thats why i can’t find out by searching the text thats already in it)

  • How do i make commands like ::unmute ::unipban ::unban and those ones? (want shortcut instead of going to character files and removing it, with all the compile stuffs and that)

  • How do i make a yell message so that evry1 can see it?

  • [IMPORTANT] if i have done ALOT changes on the server and client, would it take long to compile?

  • Does it matther where i put in the codes in the client.java? or is it good as long as its just in there?

As u see, theres quite many questions, but im complete new and i think i’ve done kinda great from till now xD

  • MrPurple

Working on: Purple Pk project
